name: Red and Shark
description:
Red and Shark it is a game made in 10 (+1) days in #GBJAM (If you like the game make sure to rate it) by

Art: Rey - @Reylisten

Prog: Luuk - @_mappache

Action Keyboard

Movement - Up, Right, Down, Left

Jump - Z

Shoot - X

in the game you are Red who finds shark in the tunel and help her to find their pieces. To found pieces you can make Shark shoot and shoot a laser platform,

no sound and no save, unfortunately, but we will work on it

The game is hard, but amazing, enjoy it~
